descriptionlist.description: Disables Bluetooth after a certain amount of time if there are no devices connected. After enabling the tweak you can set how many minutes after enabling bluetooth, and/or disconnecting a device. Alternatively you have the option to Disable Bluetooth Immediately which disables Bluetooth right after disconnecting a device

changelog.change: Timer now runs after a respring
Added the ability to choose apps to automatically enable bluetooth
Added the ability to enable bluetooth when pluged in
